cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting do_CSIRS to 2 exceeds the valid range (0 or 1) and may cause channel state information reference signal configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do_CSIRS 設定為 2 超過有效範圍（0 或 1），可能導致通道狀態資訊參考訊號配置錯誤。
